Building My Own jQuery!

There are a lot of things we can do with the browser's DOM API to mimic behavior of jQuery:

  • Select HTMLElements by searching for type, class, or id tags.
  • Inserting and removing HTMLElements dynamically.
  • Styling elements dynamically.
  • Even re-rendering elements to create animation!

While manipulating the page using the DOM API is a little clunkier than using jQuery, it is still very useful to know how to do these things in Vanilla Javascript!
